Title: Master Azure DevOps – Live AZ-400 Certification Class
Description:
In this live class, we’ll cover:
🔹 What is Azure DevOps and why does it matter
🔹 Real-world use cases of DevOps in cloud environments
🔹 Detailed breakdown of the AZ-400 exam structure and key modules
🔹 Hands-on insights: CI/CD pipelines, Infrastructure as Code, GitHub Actions, and more
🔹 Career paths after AZ-400 – from DevOps Engineer to Cloud Architect

Who should attend:
Learners who have completed AZ-104 or AZ-204
Professionals aiming to grow into DevOps roles
Anyone curious about mastering automation and cloud workflows

Trainer: Maruti Makwana, Microsoft Certified Trainer with 16+ years of cloud experience.
Summary: Join us LIVE for an in-depth session on Microsoft Azure AZ-400 Certification – Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions.

Title: Azure Certification Masterclass webinar (Live)!
Description:
What You’ll Learn in this Masterclass:

✅ How to choose the right certification for your career goals
✅ Step-by-step study plan and learning resources
✅ Hands-on labs, practice tests, and preparation strategies
✅ Tips to manage time during the exam
✅ How to stay updated with the latest 2025 certification changes

Explore all courses: https://skilltech.club

This session is perfect for:

Beginners looking to start their cloud & AI journey
IT professionals aiming for career advancement
Developers & engineers preparing for Azure & AI certifications
Anyone who wants a structured learning path

💡 By the end of this live masterclass, you’ll have a clear study roadmap and the confidence to start (and finish) your certification journey successfully.

👉 Stay tuned, ask your questions live, and let’s get you certified!
Summary: Are you preparing for your next Microsoft Azure, AI, or Cloud certification? In this live masterclass, we’ll walk you through a proven step-by-step roadmap to help you learn smarter, practice effectively, and pass your certification exam with confidence.

Title: Work Smarter with AI: Tools & Strategies for Corporate Success
Description:
What’s inside: 
Time-saving AI hacks 
Real-world automation workflows 
Productivity tools for daily work
Summary: Discover free AI tools to streamline work, automate boring tasks, and accelerate growth.

Title: Build Your First AI Agent using Azure AI in 45 Minutes – LIVE!
Description:
🔍 What We’ll Cover:
Intro to Azure AI & why it matters
Real-world AI use cases
Live Demo: Create a Q&A Agent using Azure AI Studio

Sneak peek into SkillTech’s expert-led AI courses
Q&A – Ask your doubts live!

🎓 Perfect for developers, students, tech professionals, and anyone curious about AI.

📌 Hosted by SkillTech – Your learning partner in cloud & AI technologies.
Summary: Want to build your own AI agent?  Tune in to this power-packed YouTube Live session where you'll build your first AI Agent using Azure AI – all in just 45 minutes! Explore use cases, pricing hacks, and SkillTech’s AI learning resources.
